text: Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu kulesu pubbe animantito agilāno khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā paṭidesetabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā gārayhaṃ āvuso dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ taṃ paṭidesemī ti
edit: Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu kulesu pubbe animantito agilāno khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā paṭidesetabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā gārayhaṃ āvuso dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ taṃ paṭidesemī ti

translations.transtext: 3. There are families designated as in training. Should any bhikkhu, not being ill, uninvited beforehand, chew or consume staple or non-staple food, having received it himself at the residences of families designated as in training, he is to acknowledge it: "Friends, I have committed a blameworthy, unsuitable act that ought to be acknowledged. I acknowledge it."

๓. อนึ่ง ภิกษุใด ไม่ได้รับนิมนต์ก่อนมิใช่ผู้อาพาธ รับของเคี้ยวก็ดีของฉันก็ดีในสกุลที่สงฆ์สมมติว่าเป็นเสขะ ด้วยมือของตนแล้ว เคี้ยวก็ดี ฉันก็ดีอันภิกษุนั้นพึงแสดงคืนว่า “แน่ะเธอ ฉันต้องธรรมที่น่าติ ไม่เป็นสบายควรจะแสดงคืนฉันแสดงคืนธรรมนั้น”

3. There are the kinds of families declared Initiate (i.e. in which both husband and wife are Stream-enterers and are also in poor circumstances). Should any bhikkhu who is not side acoept with his own hand without a previous invitation harder foods or softer foods among such families and chew or consume them, it should be confessed by the bhikkhu thus, "Friend, I have done a censurable thing, which is unbecoming and should be confessed. That I confess".
